net.proteusframework.core.locale

Interface TextSource

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ConcatTextSource, Dimension, FormattedTextSource, LocaleContext.MissingLocalization, LocalizedLocale, LocalizedObjectKey, LocalizedText, LowerCaseTextSource, NamedObjectTextSource, OptionallyLocalizedNamedObjectTextSource, ResourceBundleLocalizedText, StringTextSource, TextSourceEditor.MaybeLOKTextSource, TransientLocalizedObjectKey, TruncatedTextSource, UpperCaseTextSource
    Functional Interface:
    This is a functional interface and can therefore be used as the assignment target for a lambda expression or method reference.

    @FunctionalInterface
public interface TextSource
    Source of LocalizedText.
    Author:
    Russ Tennant (russ@proteus.co)
